content: hidden st 1hdc in each of the next 3sts 2hdc in the next ch1-space skip st 16 times 1hdc in each of the next 3sts 2hdc ch2 2hdc in the corner space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 38hdc per side 2hdc ch2 2hdc in each corner note the delilah square was originally designed for the fatw3 cal if you are worki ng the square for this particular cal fatw3 you will need to work the hidden stitch on round 20 so you have a final stitch count of 44 stitches per side including the corner stitches round 20 join in any corner space ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc ch2 1sc in the same space *skip the hidden st 1sc in each of the next 41sts 1sc ch2 1sc in each corner * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 41sc per side 1sc ch2 1sc in each corner 28 round 21 note join a few stitches away from your corner for a neater finish remember to watch your gauge or go up half a hook size join around the post of any st of round 19 surface slip_stitch across each st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 42 surface sl sts per side 29 th an k you for your support for more visit us on ravelry com/designers/hooked-on-sunshine hookedonsunshine co/youtube com instagram com/hooked_on_sunshine/ facebook com/groups/1370975902929963 hookedonsunshine co you can get assistance in our facebook group with pattern questions for billing or other issues you can email queries to hosteam@hookedonsunshine co as always a special thank you to our test teams keeping you hooked until next time 30
